text: Anata gata shinkō suru mono yo, shōgen ni atatte arrā no tame kōsei o kenji shi nasai. Tatoe anata gata jishin no tame, matawa ryōshin ya kinshin no tame (ni furina baai) demo, mata fusha demo, hinjadeatte mo (kōseideare). Arrā wa (anata ga tayori mo) sōhō ni motto chikai nodearu. Dakara shiyoku ni shitagatte,(kōsei kara) sorete wa naranai. Anata gataga tatoe (shōgen o) mage, matawa somuite mo, arrā wa anata gata no okonau koto o jukuchi nasa reru
